fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
On visit do a coinflip
On heads permanently increase the defense of the role, coinflipped for. If they have a attack value, increase that instead.
On tails permanently decrease the defense of the role, coinflipped for. If they have a attack value, decrease that instead.
After the 5th use, every future role will be deleted from <#970046125065265202> alongside to just disappearing without a death reason.

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: This role has no winning condition and takes on the winning condition of the next lower threat abnormality
